title: Hologram Theater Adventure #5
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Hologram Projection Booth
rooms.description: A high-tech control room filled with holographic projectors and glowing control panels. Blue and purple light emanates from the equipment. The walls are lined with storage lockers and equipment racks. Through the window, you can see the empty theater seats below. The door locked behind you when you entered.

items.name: main control panel
items.description: A sleek touchscreen panel displaying various hologram show settings and schedules
items.text: SHOW SCHEDULE: Tonight's Performance - 'Stellar Dreams' by Director Nova Chen. Show ID: 2847. All systems nominal. Emergency override requires Director authorization.

items.name: equipment storage rack
items.description: A metal rack holding various technical equipment and tools

items.name: technician access card
items.description: A magnetic card labeled 'Theater Tech - Level 2 Access'

items.name: storage locker unit
items.description: A set of three lockers used by theater staff

items.name: staff memo
items.description: A printed memo from theater management
items.text: MEMO TO ALL STAFF: Remember to use show ID numbers as locker combinations for security. Director Nova Chen has final authority on all productions. The theater's founder, Marcus Hale, built this facility in the Innovation District. Always keep emergency protocols updated.

items.name: director's keycard
items.description: A gold-trimmed access card labeled 'Director Nova Chen - Full Access'

items.name: hologram projector station
items.description: A sophisticated holographic projection system with multiple emitters

items.name: projector technical manual
items.description: A digital manual displayed on a tablet screen
items.text: HOLOGRAM PROJECTOR MANUAL: This theater uses quantum-matrix holography for ultra-realistic performances. System installed by founder Marcus Hale. For emergency shutdown, contact Director Nova Chen. Main theater access requires Level 2 credentials.

items.name: booth exit door
items.description: A reinforced door with a card reader leading down to the main theater

rooms.name: Main Theater Hall
rooms.description: A vast auditorium with rows of plush seats facing a massive holographic stage. The air shimmers with residual holographic particles. Promotional posters line the walls, and a refreshment stand sits in the corner. The stage displays a frozen holographic scene from the last performance. An emergency exit glows at the far end.

items.name: poster for Stellar Dreams
items.description: A holographic poster showing stars and nebulae
items.text: STELLAR DREAMS - A cosmic journey through space and time. Directed by Nova Chen. 'Experience the universe like never before!' - Critics' Choice Award Winner

items.name: founder's dedication plaque
items.description: A commemorative plaque mounted on the wall
items.text: This theater was founded by Marcus Hale in 2089, bringing holographic entertainment to the Innovation District. 'Where dreams become reality through light.'

items.name: director profile poster
items.description: A promotional poster featuring the theater's director
items.text: MEET DIRECTOR NOVA CHEN - Award-winning holographic artist and theater director. 'I create experiences that transcend reality.' Resident director since 2091.

items.name: automated refreshment stand
items.description: A sleek vending station with a locked maintenance panel

items.name: emergency protocol document
items.description: A sealed document with emergency procedures
items.text: EMERGENCY EXIT PROTOCOL: In case of system failure or emergency, the exit requires verification. Security questions: Who founded this theater? Where is this theater located? Who is the current director?

items.name: holographic stage
items.description: The main performance area with frozen holographic projections of stars and galaxies

items.name: tonight's program guide
items.description: A digital program for the evening's performance
items.text: TONIGHT'S PERFORMANCE: Stellar Dreams - A holographic masterpiece by Director Nova Chen. Experience the cosmos in stunning detail. Thank you for visiting our theater in the Innovation District!

items.name: emergency exit door
items.description: A heavy door with a security terminal displaying three verification questions

password_questions.question: Who founded this theater?
password_questions.hint: Check the founder's dedication plaque on the wall

password_questions.question: Where is this theater located?
password_questions.hint: Multiple documents mention the theater's location

password_questions.question: Who is the current director?
password_questions.hint: Look at the posters and staff documents

rooms.name: Theater Lobby Exit
rooms.description: You've made it to the main lobby! The exit doors slide open automatically, revealing the city lights outside. Fresh air rushes in as you step toward freedom. Behind you, the holographic theater systems power down for the night.

items.name: glass exit doors
items.description: Automatic doors leading out to the city street

items.name: lobby information display
items.description: A holographic display showing upcoming performances and theater information

rooms.win_message: Success! You've solved all the puzzles and escaped the Hologram Theater. The emergency systems recognize your authorization and grant you exit. As you step outside into the cool night air, the theater's holographic marquee flickers behind you, already advertising tomorrow's show. You win!
